author: Matthew Impelli
title: How to Properly Wear a Hospital Mask
description: Protective face masks have become more prevalent during the coronavirus pandemic, so it is important to know how to wear one the right way.
content: If you are healthy, the World Health Organization (WHO) says, you need to wear a face mask only if you are taking care of someone who has tested positive for the novel coronavirus, which causes the respiratory disease COVID-19. Those who are sick should also … [+2165 chars]
